scripts.test-shop-8.0.5: npm run build-shop -- 8.0.5-8.1-fpm-alpine && npx playwright test back
scripts.test-shop-8.1.1: npm run build-shop -- 8.1.1-8.1-fpm-alpine && npx playwright test back
scripts.test-shop-8.2.0: npm run build-shop -- 8.2.0-8.1-fpm-alpine && npx playwright test back
scripts.test-shop-1.7.7: npm run build-shop -- 1.7.7.8-7.2-fpm-alpine && npx playwright test back
scripts.test-shop-1.6.1: npm run build-shop -- 1.6.1.11-7.1-fpm-alpine && npx playwright test back
scripts.test-all-version: npx npm-run-all --serial test-shop-8.0.5 test-shop-8.1.1 test-shop-8.2.0 test-shop-1.7.7
